name: Voxurbis: Age of Politicians
description:
It's your city, and you are its citizen. Make smart decisions and pick elected officials who will ensure your future. As your city grows, adapt to its needs and remember, that time is not on your side.

You are the voice of people!

Features
  • Beautiful, randomly generated city that grows and collapses with every decision you make!
  • Simple gameplay loop that nonetheless tests your attention and ability to plan ahead!
  • Learn about the importance of being proactive when it comes to politics and governments!
Just around the corner!

The game will be out before the end of June. Stay tuned!
